page.title: 14BALL SPORTS
page.content:
We have many ball sports'areas.The areas are mainly cricket pitches.
CRICKET PITCHES
We have four cricket pitches in the bottom half of Riddlesden.The cricket pitches are owned by the council.They have selected caretakers.The caretakers have the key to the hut and the changing rooms,they clean up hut and changing rooms after the games.The caretakers wives wash the clothes e.g. white trousers,white shirts,and socks. The caretakers also look after the pitch and see that no harm is done that might ruin the grass on the pitch.The cricketers provide their own pads,cricket bats,wickets,and balls.
